caption.title: Georeferenced multiscale network of estimated domestic dog mobility.
caption.p: Dots represent patches and links represent the estimated human-mediated transports of dogs on long A), medium B), and short scales C). D) Bangui and its surrounding region. The red circle defines Banguiâ€™s neighborhood. The Central African Republic borders were generated using data from "Global Administrative Areas (2019)". University of California, Berkely. Available online: http://www.gadm.org [21/07/2019].
